#include<iostream>
#include<vector>
#include<stdio.h>

using namespace std;

vector<vector<double> > dpd(2501,vector<double>(2501,-1));
// note that you need to give space between 'vector<double>' and '>' in nested scenario

double dp(double n,double r)
{
	if(r<0 || r>n/2 || n==2)
		return 1;
	if(n==2*r)
		return r;
	if(dpd[n][r]!=-1)
		return dpd[n][r];
	double p1=r/(n-r),p2=1/(n-r-1),p3=r/(n-r-1);
	return dpd[n][r] = p1*(dp(n-2,r-1)+1) + (1-p1)*p2*(dp(n-2,r)+1) + (1-p1)*p3*(dp(n-2,r)+2) + (1-p1)*(1-p2-p3)*(dp(n,r+2)+1);
	
}

int main()
{
	double n,m;
	while(scanf("%lf",&n)!=EOF) {
		scanf("%lf",&m);
		printf("%.4lf\n",dp(n*m,0));
	}
	return 0;
}
